pars of decis tabl reduct in the size of decistabl can be accomplish by sever techniqu the techniqu considin thi paper ar on the pars of decis tablwith regard to horizont and vertic data structur job identhardwar and job prioriti and context relationship such pars restupon some convent for the linkag of decis tabl cacmaugust 1967 chapin n ca670807 jb februari 27 1978 414 pm 1548 4 1548 1548 4 1548 2220 41548 2726 4 1548 2726 4 1548 1488 5 15481489 5 1548 1548 5 1548 1548 5 1548 15485 1548 2220 5 1548 2492 5 1548 2518 51548 2598 5 1548 2616 5 1548 2726 5 1548931 6 1548 1172 6 1548 1172 6 1548 11726 1548 1237 6 1548 1327 6 1548 1327 61548 1354 6 1548 1354 6 1548 1488 6 15481489 6 1548 1489 6 1548 1548 6 1548 15486 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 6 1548 1548 61548 1548 6 1548 1684 6 1548 1684 6 1548250 6 1548 2220 6 1548 2220 6 1548 22216 1548 2263 6 1548 2263 6 1548 2453 61548 2517 6 1548 2691 6 1548
